nodes.text: Kanan's Joben T-85 speeder bike was a Joben T-85 speeder bike owned by the Jedi Knight Kanan Jarrus. It was destroyed by an Imperial orbital bombardment issued by Grand Admiral Thrawn during the Battle of Atollon in 2 BBY.[source?]

The design of Kanan's Joben T-85 speeder bike in Star Wars Rebels was revealed by Dave Filoni in Celebration Europe 2016 to have been inspired by a speeder bike Ahsoka Tano was going to use in a planned four-episode story arc of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars TV series, which went unproduced due the show's cancellation.
